properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, BOARD_NO, WRITER, CONTENT, IS_ANONIMOUS) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT DISTINCT NICK_NAME AS WRITER FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE R.BOARD_NO = ? AND R.IS_ANONIMOUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.REPLY_NO, R.BOARD_NO, NICK_NAME AS WRITER, R.CONTENT, R.RECOMMEND_COUNT, R.REPORT_COUNT, R.ENROLL_DATE, R.IS_ANONIMOUS, P_REPLY_NO, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS USERPROFILE
FROM REPLY R LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = WRITER) LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMG ON (REF_USERID = WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND WRITER = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET RECOMMEND_COUNT = RECOMMEND_COUNT + 1 WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND ? != ( SELECT WRITER FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = ?)
